text: László Sárosi (27 February 1932 - 2 April 2016) was a Hungarian footballer and coach. He played as a defender for Vasas and Hungary between the 1940s and 1960s. He was born in Budapest. Sárosi died on 2 April 2016 in Budapest, aged 84. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2016 deaths Category:1958 FIFA World Cup players Category:1962 FIFA World Cup players Category:Hungarian football managers Category:Footballers from Budapest
title: László Sárosi (footballer)
